column4: howdy, need some help if anyones up :), compiled a new kernel and booted into it, had a problem with loading the root partition i think because i forgot ext2 suppor t * no idea how*
however to fix this i tried loading my vmlinuz.old, but it gives the same error, which is odd because it worked fine before

anyway i tried every other kernel i have installed and it still gives the same error and now ive gone so far as to remove all vmlinuz files from /boot and yet it still loads a kernel and give same error
ahhh when screwing ith the kernel make a kernel backup!
